title: Philippe Coutinho makes first appearance in Barcelona colours
description: Philippe Coutinho has made his first public appearance in Barcelona colours, ahead of Monday’s medical and official presentation at the club.
content: The Brazil star took part in a brief photo shoot in front of the media sporting a Barcelona jacket after Liverpool agreed to sell him to the La Liga leaders on Saturday. Coutinho was at the Nou Camp to watch his new side's 3-0 win over Levante on Sunday following his £146m move, which would make the Brazilian the second-most expensive player in football history.Speaking about Coutinho's arrival at the club, Barcelona manager Ernesto Valverde said: "It is a signing that has been talked about for a long time. Here he is now and good luck to him because if he has luck then it will be good for us."You can watch the video of Coutinho's appearance in Barcelona by clicking on the video above.
